docs.snippet: I found this collection of parodies from the National Lampoon gross, tasteless, sophomoric, semipornographic and downright subversive. And if that doesn't make you want to rush right out and buy the book, I will add funny--wll, most of the time....
docs.lead_paragraph: I found this collection of parodies from the National Lampoon gross, tasteless, sophomoric, semipornographic and downright subversive. And if that doesn't make you want to rush right out and buy the book, I will add funny--wll, most of the time.

docs.snippet: " The Exorcist," a controversial film about demonic possession, and "The Sting," a movie about two con artists, topped the list of Oscar nominations announced today by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. Each film received 10 nominati...
docs.lead_paragraph: " The Exorcist," a controversial film about demonic possession, and "The Sting," a movie about two con artists, topped the list of Oscar nominations announced today by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. Each film received 10 nominations, including those for best picture and best director.
docs.abstract: Motion Picture Academy of Arts and Sciences on Feb 19 announces Oscar nominations; nominations noted

docs.snippet: To the editor: The right of every child, no matter how impaired physically or mentally, to a free public education is being increasingly recognized and supported by appropriate state legislative and judicial action throughout our country....
docs.lead_paragraph: To the editor: The right of every child, no matter how impaired physically or mentally, to a free public education is being increasingly recognized and supported by appropriate state legislative and judicial action throughout our country.
docs.abstract: Councilman Anthony J Mercorella lr notes that NYS educ laws provide for education of all handicapped children; notes that while appropriate programs for more severely or unusually handicapped have not been adequately developed in NYS public schools, nonprofit voluntary agencies, which have expertise and facilities, have served such children; says services of private agencies, which have for yrs supported concept of educ for handicapped, should not be eliminated

docs.lead_paragraph: The World Hockey Association's board of trustees approved a settlement agreement today with the National Hockey League aimed at ending a $50-million court fight between the leagues. Dennis Murphy, the W.H.A. president, announced approval of the agreement. Approval of a similar agreement was announced Friday by the N.H L. president,
docs.abstract: WHA trustees bd on Feb 18 approves settlement agreement with NHL aimed at ending $50-million litigation; NHL had approved similar settlement on Feb 15 (S)

docs.snippet: Five months after overthrowing President Salvador Allende, the ruling junta is approaching a decision fateful for Chile's future and critical for the flagging cause offreedom and democracy throughout the Americas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Five months after overthrowing President Salvador Allende, the ruling junta is approaching a decision fateful for Chile's future and critical for the flagging cause offreedom and democracy throughout the Americas.
docs.abstract: ed on pol situation in Chile lauds leaders of Christian Dems for writing lr to ruling junta appealing for country's freedom; deplores repression and lack of civil liberties in Chile, and warns that junta would make colossal mistake if it patterns its pol behavior after that of dictators in other South Amer countries; predicts junta will lose essential personnel, and US Govt and others will face public pressures to hold back on aid, unless pol climate improves; hopes junta will opt for gradual restoration of democracy

headline.main: Those Fanatical Fans of Foreign Flicks-Where Are They Now?; Where Are Those Foreign Film Fans? ' Last Tango' hit the jackpot-but how foreign is it really? Once the rage among hip-moviegoers, films from abroad are in decline. Here a critic offers reasons. For reports from London, Paris and Rome, see page 17.
